articles.title: India's Daily Covid Cases Cross 6,000; Centre's High-Level Meet Today - NDTV
articles.description: India's daily Covid graph saw a worrying upward curve today as the country added 6,050 cases, which is 13 per cent higher from yesterday. Daily cases have crossed the 5,000-mark for the first time since September 16 last year.
articles.content: New Delhi: India's daily Covid graph saw a worrying upward curve today as the country added 6,050 cases, which is 13 per cent higher from 5,335 cases yesterday. Daily cases have crossed the 6,000-mar… [+1300 chars]
